name: Billionhomes
overview:
Billionhomes.com is a global online real estate property archive using public available housing data. Through our search engine we try to organize this public available housing data and make it universally more accessible, clear and transparent.

A billion homes Our search engine contains more than a billion homes from all over the world. Visitors can find a specific home by entering either the address, neighborhood, city or zipcode.

Improving home information by claiming As a homeowner you can claim a home and make further improvements to the data for free. By updating this data, you are guiding our search engine in determining the B.Estimate® on the current property market empowering consumers with information and tools to make smarter decisions about homes, real estate, mortgages and other related services.

Contribute public information to our archives As a contributor you can submit home data from your area and be involved in building up our property archive. By contributing real home data you are improving the transparency of the property market in your neighborhood allowing our search engine to determine the best possible market prices and values for each home.

Receive special discounted prices on home improvement services One of our aims is to create an archive of enjoyable, durable and professionally built homes. We encourage homeowners to share and define the most common problems with their home. In return, visitors can suggest home improvements directly to homeowners. This allows professional companies to offer home solutions and services direct to homeowners.
